newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Moroccan victim of Paris bomb attack buried.
newsitem.headline: Moroccan victim of Paris bomb attack buried.

text.p: Moroccan student Mohamed Ben Chaou who was fatally wounded in the bomb attack on a train in Paris last week was buried in the Moroccan city of Casablanca on Sunday, the official news agency MAP said.
Ben Chaou, 25, who was expected to gain his doctorate in mathmematics in March, died on Thursday, two days after the attack in the Port Royal metro station.

No one has claimed responsibility for the bombing. French authorities have pointed to similarities between the attack, in which three people died and 94 were wounded, and a series of bombings last year claimed by Algerian Islamic fundamentalists.
